items.name: activateFocus()
items.description: Make view ready to get keyboard input.

items.name: addCellClassName(rowKey, columnName, className)
items.description: Add the specified css class to cell element identified by the rowKey and className

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: className
params.description: The css class name to add

items.name: addColumnClassName(columnName, className)
items.description: Add class name to all cell data of specific column.

items.name: addRowClassName(rowKey, className)
items.description: Add the specified css class to all cell elements in the row identified by the rowKey

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: className
params.description: The css class name to add

items.name: afterChange
items.description: Occurs after one or more cells is changed

params.name: changes
params.description: rowKey, column name, previous values and changed values after changing the values

items.name: afterExport
items.description: Occurs after export

items.name: afterFilter
items.description: Occurs after filtering

items.name: afterPageMove
items.description: Occurs after moving the page.

items.name: afterSort
items.description: Occurs after sorting.

items.name: afterUnfilter
items.description: Occurs after unfiltering

items.name: afterUnsort
items.description: Occurs after unsorting.

items.name: appendRow(row, options)
items.description: Insert the new row with specified data to the end of table.

params.name: row
params.description: The data for the new row

properties.name: at
properties.description: The index at which new row will be inserted

properties.name: extendPrevRowSpan
properties.description:
If set to true and the previous row at target index
has a rowspan data, the new row will extend the existing rowspan data.

properties.name: focus
properties.description: If set to true, move focus to the new row after appending

properties.name: parentRowKey
properties.description: Deprecated: Tree row key of the parent which appends given rows

items.name: appendRows(data)
items.description: append rows.

items.name: appendTreeRow(row, options)
items.description: Insert the new tree row with specified data.

params.name: row
params.description: The tree data for the new row

properties.name: parentRowKey
properties.description: Tree row key of the parent which appends given rows

properties.name: offset
properties.description: The offset value to insert new tree row

properties.name: focus
properties.description: If set to true, move focus to the new tree row after appending

items.name: applyTheme(presetName, extOptions)
items.description: Apply theme to all grid instances with the preset options of a given name.

params.name: presetName
params.description: preset theme name. Available values are 'default', 'striped' and 'clean'.

params.name: extOptions
params.description: if exist, extend preset options with this object.

properties.name: outline
properties.description: Styles for the table outline.

properties.name: border
properties.description: Color of the table outline.

properties.name: showVerticalBorder
properties.description:
Whether vertical outlines of
the table are visible.

properties.name: selection
properties.description: Styles for a selection layer.

properties.name: background
properties.description: Background color of a selection layer.

properties.name: border
properties.description: Border color of a selection layer.

properties.name: scrollbar
properties.description: Styles for scrollbars.

properties.name: border
properties.description: Border color of scrollbars.

properties.name: background
properties.description: Background color of scrollbars.

properties.name: emptySpace
properties.description: Color of extra spaces except scrollbar.

properties.name: thumb
properties.description: Color of thumbs in scrollbars.

properties.name: active
properties.description:
Color of arrows(for IE) or
thumb:hover(for other browsers) in scrollbars.

properties.name: frozenBorder
properties.description: Styles for a frozen border.

properties.name: border
properties.description: Border color of a frozen border.

properties.name: area
properties.description: Styles for the table areas.

properties.name: header
properties.description: Styles for the header area in the table.

properties.name: background
properties.description:
Background color of the header area
in the table.

properties.name: border
properties.description:
Border color of the header area
in the table.

properties.name: body
properties.description: Styles for the body area in the table.

properties.name: background
properties.description:
Background color of the body area
in the table.

properties.name: summary
properties.description: Styles for the summary area in the table.

properties.name: background
properties.description:
Background color of the summary area
in the table.

properties.name: border
properties.description:
Border color of the summary area
in the table.

properties.name: row
properties.description: Styles for the table rows.

properties.name: even
properties.description: Styles for even row.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of even row.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of even row.

properties.name: odd
properties.description: Styles for odd row.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of cells in odd row.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of odd row.

properties.name: dummy
properties.description: Styles of dummy row.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of dummy row.

properties.name: hover
properties.description: Styles of hovered row.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of hovered row.

properties.name: cell
properties.description: Styles for the table cells.

properties.name: normal
properties.description: Styles for normal cells.

properties.name: background
properties.description: Background color of normal cells.

properties.name: border
properties.description: Border color of normal cells.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Text color of normal cells.

properties.name: showVerticalBorder
properties.description:
Whether vertical borders of
normal cells are visible.

properties.name: showHorizontalBorder
properties.description:
Whether horizontal borders of
normal cells are visible.

properties.name: header
properties.description: Styles for header cells.

properties.name: background
properties.description: Background color of header cells.

properties.name: border
properties.description: border color of header cells.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of header cells.

properties.name: showVerticalBorder
properties.description:
Whether vertical borders of
header cells are visible.

properties.name: showHorizontalBorder
properties.description:
Whether horizontal borders of
header cells are visible.

properties.name: selectedHeader
properties.description: Styles for selected header cells.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of selected header cells.

properties.name: rowHeader
properties.description: Styles for row's header cells.

properties.name: background
properties.description: Background color of row's header cells.

properties.name: border
properties.description: border color of row's header cells.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of row's header cells.

properties.name: showVerticalBorder
properties.description:
Whether vertical borders of
row's header cells are visible.

properties.name: showHorizontalBorder
properties.description:
Whether horizontal borders of
row's header cells are visible.

properties.name: selectedRowHeader
properties.description: Styles for selected row's header cells.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of selected row's haed cells.

properties.name: summary
properties.description: Styles for cells in the summary area.

properties.name: background
properties.description: Background color of cells in the summary area.

properties.name: border
properties.description: border color of cells in the summary area.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of cells in the summary area.

properties.name: showVerticalBorder
properties.description:
Whether vertical borders of
cells in the summary area are visible.

properties.name: showHorizontalBorder
properties.description:
Whether horizontal borders of
cells in the summary area are visible.

properties.name: focused
properties.description: Styles for a focused cell.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of a focused cell.

properties.name: border
properties.description: border color of a focused cell.

properties.name: focusedInactive
properties.description: Styles for a inactive focus cell.

properties.name: border
properties.description: border color of a inactive focus cell.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Styles for required cells.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of required cells.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of required cells.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Styles for editable cells.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of the editable cells.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of the selected editable cells.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Styles for disabled cells.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of disabled cells.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of disabled cells.

properties.name: invalid
properties.description: Styles for invalid cells.

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of invalid cells.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of invalid cells.

properties.name: currentRow
properties.description: Styles for cells in a current row.(deprecated since version 4.4.0)

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of cells in a current row.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of cells in a current row.

properties.name: evenRow
properties.description: Styles for cells in even rows.(deprecated since version 4.4.0)

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of cells in even rows.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of cells in even rows.

properties.name: oddRow
properties.description: Styles for cells in even rows.(deprecated since version 4.4.0)

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of cells in odd rows.

properties.name: text
properties.description: text color of cells in odd rows.

properties.name: dummy
properties.description: Styles for dummy cells.(deprecated since version 4.4.0)

properties.name: background
properties.description: background color of dummy cells.

examples.code: var Grid = tui.Grid; // or require('tui-grid') Grid.applyTheme('striped', { grid: { border: '#aaa', text: '#333' }, cell: { disabled: { text: '#999' } } });

items.name: beforeChange
items.description: Occurs before one or more cells is changed

params.name: changes
params.description: rowKey, column name, original values and next values before changing the values

items.name: beforeExport
items.description: Occurs before export

params.name: exportFn
params.description: Callback function to export modified data

items.name: beforeFilter
items.description: Occurs before filtering.

params.name: conditionFn
params.description: Original function to filter the data in grid.

params.name: columnFilterState
params.description:
Next filter state of column which triggers the event.
If the event is not stopped this state will be applied to grid.

items.name: beforePageMove
items.description: Occurs before moving the page.

items.name: beforeSort
items.description: Occurs before sorting.

params.name: ascending
params.description:
Next ascending state of a column.
If the event is not stopped this ascending state will be applied to grid.

items.name: beforeUnfilter
items.description: Occurs before unfiltering

items.name: beforeUnsort
items.description: Occurs before unsorting.

params.name: sortState
params.description: Current sort state of the grid

items.name: blur()
items.description: Remove focus from the focused cell.

items.name: cancelEditing()
items.description: Cancel the editing.

items.name: check
items.description: Occurs when a checkbox in row header is checked

items.name: check(rowKey)
items.description: Check the row identified by the specified rowKey.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: checkAll
items.description: Occurs when a checkbox in header is checked(checked all checkbox in row header)

items.name: checkAll(allPage)
items.description: Check all rows.

params.name: allPage
params.description: check all rows when using pagination. The default value is 'true'.

items.name: checkBetween(startRowKey, endRowKey)
items.description: Check the rows between the specified rowKeys. If endRowKey is not passed, perform 'check' on the row of startRowKey.

params.name: startRowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: endRowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: clear()
items.description: Remove all rows.

items.name: clearModifiedData(type)
items.description:
clear the modified data that is returned as the result of 'getModifiedRows' method.
If the 'type' parameter is undefined, all modified data is cleared.

items.name: click
items.description:
Occurs when a mouse button is clicked on the Grid.
The properties of the event object include the native event object.

items.name: collapse
items.description: Occurs when the row having child rows is collapsed

items.name: collapse(rowKey, recursive)
items.description: Expand tree row.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: recursive
params.description: true for recursively expand all descendant

items.name: collapseAll()
items.description: Collapse all tree row.

items.name: copyToClipboard()
items.description: Copy to clipboard

items.name: dblclick
items.description:
Occurs when a mouse button is double clicked on the Grid.
The properties of the event object include the native event object.

items.name: destroy()
items.description: Destroy the instance.

items.name: disable()
items.description: Disable all rows.

items.name: disableCell(rowKey, columnName)
items.description: Disable the cell identified by the row key and column name.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row.

items.name: disableColumn(columnName)
items.description: Disable the column identified by the column name.

items.name: disableRow(rowKey, withCheckbox)
items.description: Disable the row identified by the rowkey.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the target row

params.name: withCheckbox
params.description: change including checkbox. The default value is 'true'

items.name: disableRowCheck(rowKey)
items.description: Disable the row identified by the specified rowKey to not be able to check.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row.

items.name: drag
items.description: Occurs when dragging the row

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The rowKey of the dragging row

params.name: targetRowKey
params.description: The rowKey of the row at current dragging position

params.name: appended
params.description: Whether the row is appended to other row as the child in tree data.

items.name: dragStart
items.description: Occurs when starting to drag the row

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The rowKey of the row to drag

items.name: drop
items.description: Occurs when dropping the row

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The rowKey of the dragging row

params.name: targetRowKey
params.description: The rowKey of the row at current dragging position

params.name: appended
params.description: Whether the row is appended to other row as the child in tree data.

items.name: editingFinish
items.description: Occurs when editing the cell is finished

params.name: triggeredByKey
params.description: Whether to trigger the event by key

items.name: editingStart
items.description: Occurs when editing the cell is started

items.name: enable()
items.description: Enable all rows.

items.name: enableCell(rowKey, columnName)
items.description: Enable the cell identified by the row key and column name.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row.

items.name: enableColumn(columnName)
items.description: Enable the column identified by the column name.

items.name: enableRow(rowKey, withCheckbox)
items.description: Enable the row identified by the rowKey.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the target row

params.name: withCheckbox
params.description: change including checkbox. The default value is 'true'

items.name: enableRowCheck(rowKey)
items.description: Enable the row identified by the rowKey to be able to check.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: expand
items.description: Occurs when the row having child rows is expanded

items.name: expand(rowKey, recursive)
items.description: Expand tree row.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: recursive
params.description: true for recursively expand all descendant

items.name: expandAll()
items.description: Expand all tree row.

items.name: export(format, options)
items.description: Export a file in the specified format

properties.name: includeHeader
properties.description: Whether to include headers

properties.name: includeHiddenColumns
properties.description: Whether to include hidden columns

properties.name: columnNames
properties.description: Columns names to export

properties.name: onlySelected
properties.description: Whether to export only the selected range

properties.name: onlyFiltered
properties.description: Whether to export only the filtered data

properties.name: useFormattedValue
properties.description: Whether to export formatted values or original values

properties.name: delimiter
properties.description: Delimiter to export CSV

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: File name to export

items.name: filter
items.description: Occurs after filtering

items.name: filter(columnName, state)
items.description: Filter the data.

examples.code: grid.filter('name', [{code: 'eq', value: 3}, {code: 'eq', value: 4}]);

items.name: findRows(conditions)
items.description: Find rows by conditions

params.name: conditions
params.description:
object (key: column name, value: column value) or
function that check the value and returns true/false result to find rows

examples.code: grid.findRows({ artist: 'Birdy', price: 10000 });
grid.findRows((row) => { return (/b/ig.test(row.artist) && row.price > 10000); });

items.name: finishEditing(rowKey, columnName, value)
items.description: Save editing value and finishes to edit.

items.name: focus(rowKey, columnName, setScroll)
items.description: Focus to the cell identified by given rowKey and columnName.

params.name: setScroll
params.description: if set to true, move scroll position to focused position

returns.description: true if focused cell is changed

items.name: focusAt(rowIndex, columnIndex, setScroll)
items.description: Focus to the cell identified by given rowIndex and columnIndex.

params.name: setScroll
params.description: if set to true, scroll to focused cell

items.name: focusChange
items.description: Occurs when focused cell is about to change

params.name: prevRowKey
params.description: rowKey of the currently focused cell

params.name: prevColumnName
params.description: columnName of the currently focused cell

items.name: getAncestorRows(rowKey)
items.description: Get the ancestors of the row which has the given row key.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: getCellClassName(rowKey, columnName)
items.description: Return a list of class names of specific cell.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: getCheckedRowKeys()
items.description: Return a list of the rowKey of checked rows.

items.name: getCheckedRows()
items.description: Return a list of the checked rows.

returns.description: A list of the checked rows.

items.name: getChildRows(rowKey)
items.description: Get the children of the row which has the given row key.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: getColumn(columnName)
items.description: Return a specific column model.

items.name: getColumnClassName(columnName)
items.description: Return a list of class names of specific column.

items.name: getColumns()
items.description: Return a list of the column model.

returns.description: A list of the column model.

items.name: getColumnValues(columnName)
items.description: Return a list of all values in the specified column.

returns.description: A List of all values in the specified column. (or JSON string of the list)

items.name: getData()
items.description: Return a list of all rows.

items.name: getDepth(rowKey)
items.description: Get the depth of the row which has the given row key.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: getDescendantRows(rowKey)
items.description: Get the descendants of the row which has the given row key.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: getElement(rowKey, columnName)
items.description: Return the HTMLElement of the cell identified by the rowKey and columnName.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

returns.description: The HTMLElement of the cell element

items.name: getFilteredData()
items.description: Return a list of filtered rows.

items.name: getFilterState()
items.description: Get filter state.

items.name: getFocusedCell()
items.description: Return data of currently focused cell

returns.description: rowKey - The unique key of the row
columnName - The name of the column
value - The value of the cell

items.name: getFormattedValue(rowKey, columnName)
items.description: Return the formatted value of the cell identified by the rowKey and columnName.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the target row.

returns.description: The formatted value of the cell

items.name: getIndexOfColumn(columnName)
items.description: Return the index of the column indentified by the column name.

params.name: columnName
params.description: The unique key of the column

items.name: getIndexOfRow(rowKey)
items.description: Return the index of the row indentified by the rowKey.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: getModifiedRows(options)
items.description:
Return the object that contains the lists of changed data compared to the original data.
The object has properties 'createdRows', 'updatedRows', 'deletedRows'.

properties.name: checkedOnly
properties.description: If set to true, only checked rows will be considered.

properties.name: withRawData
properties.description:
If set to true, the data will contains
the row data for internal use.

properties.name: rowKeyOnly
properties.description:
If set to true, only keys of the changed
rows will be returned.

properties.name: ignoredColumns
properties.description: A list of column name to be excluded.

returns.description: Object that contains the result list.

items.name: getPagination()
items.description: Return an instance of tui.Pagination.

items.name: getPaginationTotalCount()
items.description: Get total count of items with the current pagination

items.name: getParentRow(rowKey)
items.description: Get the parent of the row which has the given row key.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: getRow(rowKey)
items.description: Return the object that contains all values in the specified row.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the target row

returns.description: The object that contains all values in the row.

items.name: getRowAt(rowIdx)
items.description: Return the object that contains all values in the row at specified index.

returns.description: The object that contains all values in the row.

items.name: getRowClassName(rowKey)
items.description: Return a list of class names of specific row.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: getRowCount()
items.description: Return the total number of the rows.

returns.description: The total number of the rows

items.name: getRowSpanData(rowKey, columnName)
items.description: Return the rowspan data of the cell identified by the rowKey and columnName.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: getSelectionRange()
items.description: get Selection range

returns.description: range.start - Index info of start selection (ex: rowIndex, columnIndex)
range.end - Index info of end selection (ex: rowIndex, columnIndex)

items.name: getSortState()
items.description: Get state of the sorted column in rows

items.name: getSummaryValues(columnName)
items.description:
Return the values of given column summary.
If the column name is not specified, all values of available columns are returned.
The shape of returning object looks like the example below.

examples.code: { sum: 1000, avg: 200, max: 300, min: 50, cnt: 5, filtered: { sum: 1000, avg: 200, max: 300, min: 50, cnt: 5 } }

items.name: getValue(rowKey, columnName)
items.description: Return the value of the cell identified by the rowKey and columnName.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the target row.

items.name: hideColumn(columnName, arguments)
items.description: Hide columns

items.name: isModified()
items.description: Return true if there are at least one row modified.

returns.description: True if there are at least one row modified.

items.name: mousedown
items.description:
Occurs when a mouse button is downed on the Grid.
The event object has all properties copied from the native MouseEvent.

items.name: mouseout
items.description:
Occurs when a mouse pointer is moved off from the Grid.
The event object has all properties copied from the native MouseEvent.

items.name: mouseover
items.description:
Occurs when a mouse pointer is moved onto the Grid.
The properties of the event object include the native MouseEvent object.

items.name: moveColumn(columnName, targetIndex)
items.description:
Move the column identified by the specified column name to target index.
If there is hidden columns or use complex columns, this couldn't be used.
If the column of column name is row header column or tree column, this couldn't be used.

params.name: columnName
params.description: The column name of the column

items.name: moveRow(rowKey, targetIndex, options)
items.description:
Move the row identified by the specified rowKey to target index.
Use setRows for a lot of data, as using setRow can cause performance issues.
If data is sorted or filtered, this couldn't be used.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

properties.name: appended
properties.description: This option for only tree data. Whether the row is appended to other row as the child.

items.name: new Grid(options, el)
items.description: Grid public API

properties.name: data
properties.description: Grid data for making rows. When using the data source, sets to object.

properties.name: pageOptions
properties.description: The object for the pagination options.

properties.name: header
properties.description: Options object for header.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the header area.

properties.name: align
properties.description:
Horizontal alignment of the header content.
Available values are 'left', 'center', 'right'.

properties.name: valign
properties.description:
Vertical alignment of the row header content.
Available values are 'top', 'middle', 'bottom'.

properties.name: complexColumns
properties.description:
This options creates new parent headers of the multiple columns
which includes the headers of specified columns, and sets up the hierarchy.

properties.name: header
properties.description: The header of the complex column to be shown on the header.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of column that makes tree column.

properties.name: childNames
properties.description: The name of the child header(subheader).

properties.name: renderer
properties.description: Sets the custom renderer to customize the header content.

properties.name: headerAlign
properties.description:
Horizontal alignment of the header content.
Available values are 'left', 'center', 'right'.

properties.name: headerVAlign
properties.description:
Vertical alignment of the row header content.
Available values are 'top', 'middle', 'bottom'.

properties.name: hideChildHeaders
properties.description: If set to true, the child columns header are hidden.

properties.name: resizable
properties.description: If set to true, resize-handles of each complex columns will be shown.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Options for grid width.

properties.name: rowHeight
properties.description:
The height of each rows.
The height of each rows expands to dom's height. If set to number, the height is fixed and the minimum is 9.

properties.name: minRowHeight
properties.description: The minimum height of each rows.

properties.name: bodyHeight
properties.description:
The height of body area. The default value is 'auto',
the height of body area expands to total height of rows. If set to 'fitToParent', the height of the grid
will expand to fit the height of parent element. If set to number, the height is fixed.

properties.name: minBodyHeight
properties.description:
The minimum height of body area. When this value
is larger than the body's height, it set to the body's height.

properties.name: columnOptions
properties.description: Option object for all columns

properties.name: minWidth
properties.description: Minimum width of each columns

properties.name: resizable
properties.description:
If set to true, resize-handles of each columns
will be shown.

properties.name: frozenCount
properties.description:
The number of frozen columns.
The columns indexed from 0 to this value will always be shown on the left side.
Grid#setFrozenColumnCount can be used for setting this value dynamically.

properties.name: frozenBorderWidth
properties.description:
The value of frozen border width.
When the frozen columns are created by "frozenCount" option, the frozen border width set.

properties.name: treeColumnOptions
properties.description: Option object for the tree column.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of column that makes tree column.

properties.name: useIcon
properties.description:
If set to true, the folder or file icon is created on
the left side of the tree cell data.

properties.name: useCascadingCheckbox
properties.description:
If set to true, a cascading relationship is
created in the checkbox between parent and child rows.

properties.name: indentWidth
properties.description: Base indent width to set for child nodes

properties.name: copyOptions
properties.description: Option object for clipboard copying

properties.name: useFormattedValue
properties.description:
Whether to use formatted values or original values
as a string to be copied to the clipboard

properties.name: useListItemText
properties.description:
Copy select or checkbox cell values to 'text'
rather than 'value' of the listItem option.

properties.name: customValue
properties.description: Copy text with 'formatter' in cell.

properties.name: useClientSort
properties.description:
If set to true, sorting will be executed by client itself
without server.

properties.name: editingEvent
properties.description:
If set to 'click', editable cell in the view-mode will be
changed to edit-mode by a single click.

properties.name: scrollX
properties.description: Specifies whether to show horizontal scrollbar.

properties.name: scrollY
properties.description: Specifies whether to show vertical scrollbar.

properties.name: showDummyRows
properties.description: If set to true, empty area will be filled with dummy rows.

properties.name: keyColumnName
properties.description:
The name of the column to be used to identify each rows.
If not specified, unique value for each rows will be created internally.

properties.name: heightResizable
properties.description: If set to true, a handle for resizing height will be shown.

properties.name: selectionUnit
properties.description: The unit of selection on Grid. ('cell', 'row')

properties.name: rowHeaders
properties.description:
Options for making the row header. The row header content is number of
each row or input element. The value of each item is enable to set string type. (ex: 'rowNum', 'checkbox')

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the row header. ('rowNum', 'checkbox')

properties.name: header
properties.description: The header of the row header.

properties.name: width
properties.description:
The width of the row header column. The unit is pixel.
If this value isn't set, the column's width sets to default value.

properties.name: align
properties.description:
Horizontal alignment of the row header content.
Available values are 'left', 'center', 'right'.

properties.name: valign
properties.description:
Vertical alignment of the row header content.
Available values are 'top', 'middle', 'bottom'.

properties.name: renderer
properties.description: Sets the custom renderer to customize the header content.

properties.name: columns
properties.description: The configuration of the grid columns.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the column.

properties.name: ellipsis
properties.description:
If set to true, ellipsis will be used
for overflowing content.(This option will be deprecated)

properties.name: align
properties.description:
Horizontal alignment of the column content.
Available values are 'left', 'center', 'right'.

properties.name: valign
properties.description:
Vertical alignment of the column content.
Available values are 'top', 'middle', 'bottom'.

properties.name: className
properties.description:
The name of the class to be used for all cells of
the column.

properties.name: header
properties.description: The header of the column to be shown on the header.

properties.name: width
properties.description:
The width of the column. The unit is pixel. If this value
isn't set, the column's width is automatically resized.

properties.name: minWidth
properties.description: The minimum width of the column. The unit is pixel.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: If set to true, the column will not be shown.

properties.name: resizable
properties.description:
If set to false, the width of the column
will not be changed.

properties.name: validation
properties.description:
The options to be used for validation.
Validation is executed whenever data is changed or the Grid#validate is called.

properties.name: required
properties.description:
If set to true, the data of the column
will be checked to be not empty.

properties.name: dataType
properties.description:
Specifies the type of the cell value.
Available types are 'string' and 'number'.

properties.name: min
properties.description:
If set to numeric value, the data of the column
will be checked to be greater than 'min' value.
Available types are 'string' and 'number'.

properties.name: max
properties.description:
If set to numeric value, the data of the column
will be checked to be less than 'max' value.

properties.name: regExp
properties.description:
If set to regular expression, the data of the column
will be checked using the regular expression.

properties.name: validatorFn
properties.description:
If set to function, the data of the column
will be checked using the result of the custom validator.

properties.name: unique
properties.description: If set to true, check the uniqueness on the data of the column.

properties.name: defaultValue
properties.description:
The default value to be shown when the column
doesn't have a value.

properties.name: formatter
properties.description:
The function that formats the value of the cell.
The return value of the function will be shown as the value of the cell. If set to 'listItemText',
the value will be shown the text.

properties.name: escapeHTML
properties.description:
If set to true, the value of the cell
will be encoded as HTML entities.

properties.name: ignored
properties.description:
If set to true, the value of the column will be
ignored when setting up the list of modified rows.

properties.name: sortable
properties.description:
If set to true, sort button will be shown on
the right side of the column header, which executes the sort action when clicked.

properties.name: sortingType
properties.description:
If set to 'desc', will execute descending sort initially
when sort button is clicked.

properties.name: comparator
properties.description:
The custom comparator that sorts the data of the column.
The return value should be same as the result of general 'compareFunction'.

properties.name: onBeforeChange
properties.description:
The function that will be
called before changing the value of the cell. If stop() method in event object is called,
the changing will be canceled.

properties.name: onAfterChange
properties.description:
The function that will be
called after changing the value of the cell.

properties.name: editor
properties.description: The object for configuring editing UI.

properties.name: type
properties.description:
The string value that specifies
the type of the editing UI. Available values are 'text', 'password', 'select', 'radio', 'checkbox'.
When using the custom editor, sets to the customized renderer constructor.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Option object using editor

properties.name: copyOptions
properties.description:
Option object for clipboard copying.
This option is column specific, and overrides the global copyOptions.

properties.name: useFormattedValue
properties.description:
Whether to use
formatted values or original values as a string to be copied to the clipboard

properties.name: useListItemText
properties.description:
Whether to use
concatenated text or original values as a string to be copied to the clipboard

properties.name: customValue
properties.description:
Whether to use
customized value from "customValue" callback or original values as a string to be copied to the clipboard

properties.name: relations
properties.description: Specifies relation between this and other column.

properties.name: targetNames
properties.description: Array of the names of target columns.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description:
If returns true, target columns
will be disabled.

properties.name: editable
properties.description:
If returns true, target columns
will be editable.

properties.name: listItems
properties.description:
The function whose return
value specifies the option list for the 'select', 'radio', 'checkbox' type.
The options list of target columns will be replaced with the return value of this function.

properties.name: whiteSpace
properties.description:
If set to 'normal', the text line is broken
by fitting to the column's width. If set to 'pre', spaces are preserved and the text is braken by
new line characters. If set to 'pre-wrap', spaces are preserved, the text line is broken by
fitting to the column's width and new line characters. If set to 'pre-line', spaces are merged,
the text line is broken by fitting to the column's width and new line characters.(This option will be deprecated)

properties.name: rowSpan
properties.description:
If set to true, apply dynamic rowspan to column data.
If it is not a top-level relational column of a column relationship or the grid has tree data, dynamic rowspan is not applied.

properties.name: summary
properties.description: The object for configuring summary area.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the summary area.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The position of the summary area. ('bottom', 'top')

properties.name: defaultContent
properties.description:
The configuring of summary cell for every column.
This options can be overriden for each column by columnContent options.
If type is string, the value is used as HTML of summary cell for every columns
without auto-calculation.

properties.name: useAutoSummary
properties.description:
If set to true, the summary value of every column is served as a parameter to the template
function whenever data is changed.

properties.name: template
properties.description:
Template function which returns the
content(HTML) of the column of the summary. This function takes an K-V object as a parameter
which contains a summary values keyed by 'sum', 'avg', 'min', 'max' and 'cnt'.

properties.name: columnContent
properties.description:
The configuring of summary cell for each column.
Sub options below are keyed by each column name.
If type of value of this object is string, the value is used as HTML of summary cell for
the column without auto-calculation.

properties.name: useAutoSummary
properties.description:
If set to true, the summary value of each column is served as a parameter to the template
function whenever data is changed.

properties.name: template
properties.description:
Template function which returns the
content(HTML) of the column of the summary. This function takes an K-V object as a parameter
which contains a summary values keyed by 'sum', 'avg', 'min', 'max' and 'cnt'.

properties.name: usageStatistics
properties.description:
Send the hostname to google analytics.
If you do not want to send the hostname, this option set to false.

properties.name: onGridMounted
properties.description: The function that will be called after rendering the grid.

properties.name: onGridUpdated
properties.description: The function that will be called after updating the all data of the grid and rendering the grid.

properties.name: onGridBeforeDestroy
properties.description: The function that will be called before destroying the grid.

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Whether to enable to drag the row for changing the order of rows.

properties.name: contextMenu
properties.description: Option array for the context menu.

params.name: el
params.description: The target element to create grid.

items.name: off(eventName, fn)
items.description: Remove custom event to grid.

items.name: on(eventName, fn)
items.description: Add custom event to grid.

items.name: onGridBeforeDestroy
items.description: Occurs before the grid is detached from DOM

items.name: onGridMounted
items.description: Occurs when the grid is mounted on DOM

items.name: onGridUpdated
items.description:
Occurs when the grid data is updated and the grid is rendered onto the DOM
The event occurs only in the following API as below.
'resetData', 'restore', 'reloadData', 'readData', 'setPerPage' with 'dataSource', using 'dataSource'

items.name: prependRow(row, options)
items.description: Insert the new row with specified data to the beginning of table.

params.name: row
params.description: The data for the new row

properties.name: focus
properties.description: If set to true, move focus to the new row after appending

items.name: readData(page, data, resetData)
items.description: Request 'readData' to the server. The last requested data will be extended with new data.

params.name: data
params.description: Data(parameters) to send to the server

params.name: resetData
params.description: If set to true, last requested data will be ignored.

items.name: refreshLayout()
items.description: Refresh the layout view. Use this method when the view was rendered while hidden.

items.name: reloadData()
items.description: Request 'readData' with last requested data.

items.name: removeCellClassName(rowKey, columnName, className)
items.description: Remove the specified css class from the cell element indentified by the rowKey and columnName.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: className
params.description: The css class name to be removed

items.name: removeCheckedRows(showConfirm)
items.description: Remove all checked rows.

params.name: showConfirm
params.description: If set to true, confirm message will be shown before remove.

returns.description: True if there's at least one row removed.

items.name: removeColumnClassName(columnName, className)
items.description: Remove class name to all cell data of specific column.

items.name: removeRow(rowKey, options)
items.description: Remove the row identified by the specified rowKey.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: removeRowClassName(rowKey, className)
items.description: Remove the specified css class from all cell elements in the row identified by the rowKey.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: className
params.description: The css class name to be removed

items.name: removeRows(rowKeys)
items.description: Remove the rows identified by the specified rowKeys.

params.name: rowKeys
params.description: The array of unique keys of the row

items.name: removeTreeRow(rowKey)
items.description: Remove the tree row identified by the specified rowKey.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: request(requestType, options)
items.description: Send request to server to sync data

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL to send the request

properties.name: method
properties.description: method to send the request

properties.name: checkedOnly
properties.description: Whether the request param only contains checked rows

properties.name: modifiedOnly
properties.description: Whether the request param only contains modified rows

properties.name: showConfirm
properties.description: Whether to show confirm dialog before sending request

properties.name: withCredentials
properties.description: Use withCredentials flag of XMLHttpRequest for ajax requests if true

items.name: resetColumnWidths(widths)
items.description: Reset the width of each column by using initial setting of column models.

params.name: widths
params.description: An array of column widths to set. If there's no parameter, it reset auto-resizing column width.

items.name: resetData(data, options)
items.description: Replace all rows with the specified list. This will not change the original data.

properties.name: sortState
properties.description:
If set the sortState, the sort state will be applied when the new rows are set.
It is recommended that you do not use it unless you are getting the sorted data by communicating with the server without DataSource.

properties.name: columnName
properties.description: Target column name.

properties.name: ascending
properties.description: The ascending state of specific column which will apply to the grid.

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Whether to use multiple sorting.

properties.name: filterState
properties.description:
If set the filterState, the filter state will be applied when the new rows are set.
It is recommended that you do not use it unless you are getting the filtered data by communicating with the server without DataSource.

properties.name: columnName
properties.description: Target column name.

properties.name: columnFilterState
properties.description: The column filter state of column which will apply to the grid.

properties.name: code
properties.description: Code for column filter(ex. 'eq', 'gt').

properties.name: value
properties.description: Input value for column filter.

properties.name: pageState
properties.description:
If set the pageState, the pagination state will be applied when the new rows are set.
It is recommended that you do not use it unless you are getting the paginated data by communicating with the server without DataSource.

properties.name: page
properties.description: Target page number.

properties.name: totalCount
properties.description: The total pagination count.

properties.name: perPage
properties.description: Number of rows per page.

items.name: resetOriginData()
items.description:
reset original data to current data.
(Original data is set by resetData

items.name: restore()
items.description:
Restore the data to the original data.
(Original data is set by resetData

items.name: scrollEnd
items.description: Occurs when scroll at the bottommost

items.name: setBodyHeight(bodyHeight)
items.description: Set the height of body-area.

items.name: setColumnHeaders(columnsMap)
items.description: Set columns title

examples.code: { columnName1: 'title1', columnName2: 'title2', columnName3: 'title3' }

items.name: setColumns(columns)
items.description: Set the list of column model.

params.name: columns
params.description: A new list of column model

items.name: setColumnValues(columnName, columnValue, checkCellState)
items.description: Set the all values in the specified column.

params.name: checkCellState
params.description: If set to true, only editable and not disabled cells will be affected.

items.name: setFilter(columnName, filterOpt)
items.description: Set the option of column filter.

items.name: setFrozenColumnCount(count)
items.description: Set the count of frozen columns.

params.name: count
params.description: The count of columns to be frozen

items.name: setHeader(options)
items.description: Set options for header.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height value

properties.name: complexColumns
properties.description: The complex columns info

items.name: setHeight(height)
items.description: Set the height of the dimension.

items.name: setLanguage(localeCode, data)
items.description: Set language

params.name: localeCode
params.description:
Code to set locale messages and
this is the language or language-region combination (ex: en-US)

examples.code: var Grid = tui.Grid; // or require('tui-grid') Grid.setLanguage('en'); // default and set English Grid.setLanguage('ko'); // set Korean Grid.setLanguage('en-US', { // set new language display: { noData: 'No data.', loadingData: 'Loading data.', resizeHandleGuide: 'You can change the width of the column by mouse drag, ' + 'and initialize the width by double-clicking.' }, net: { confirmCreate: 'Are you sure you want to create {{count}} data?', confirmUpdate: 'Are you sure you want to update {{count}} data?', confirmDelete: 'Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} data?', confirmModify: 'Are you sure you want to modify {{count}} data?', noDataToCreate: 'No data to create.', noDataToUpdate: 'No data to update.', noDataToDelete: 'No data to delete.', noDataToModify: 'No data to modify.', failResponse: 'An error occurred while requesting data.\nPlease try again.' } });

items.name: setPaginationTotalCount(totalCount)
items.description: Set total count of items for calculating the pagination.

items.name: setPerPage(perPage, data)
items.description: Set number of rows per page and reload current page

params.name: data
params.description: Data(parameters) to send to the server

items.name: setRequestParams(params)
items.description: Set parameters to be sent with the request to communicate with the server.

params.name: params
params.description: parameters to send to the server

items.name: setRow(rowKey, row)
items.description: Set new data to the row identified by the specified rowKey.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: row
params.description: The object that contains all values in the row.

items.name: setRows(rows)
items.description:
Set new data to the all rows identified by the specified rowKey.
Use setRows for a lot of data, as using setRow can cause performance issues.

params.name: rows
params.description: The object that contains all values in the row with rowKey.

items.name: setSelectionRange(range)
items.description: Select cells or rows by range

properties.name: start
properties.description: Index info of start selection (ex: rowIndex, columnIndex)

properties.name: end
properties.description: Index info of end selection (ex: rowIndex, columnIndex)

items.name: setSummaryColumnContent(columnName, columnContent)
items.description:
Set the HTML string of given column summary.
The type of content is the same as the options.summary.columnContent of the constructor.

items.name: setValue(rowKey, columnName, value, checkCellState)
items.description: Set the value of the cell identified by the specified rowKey and columnName.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: checkCellState
params.description: If set to true, only editable and not disabled cells will be affected.

items.name: setWidth(width)
items.description: Set the width of the dimension.

items.name: showColumn(columnName, arguments)
items.description: Show columns

items.name: sort
items.description: Occurs after sorting.

items.name: sort(columnName, ascending, multiple)
items.description: Sort all rows by the specified column.

params.name: columnName
params.description: The name of the column to be used to compare the rows

params.name: ascending
params.description:
Whether the sort order is ascending.
If not specified, use the negative value of the current order.

items.name: startEditing(rowKey, columnName, setScroll)
items.description: Set focus on the cell at the specified index of row and column and starts to edit.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: setScroll
params.description: If set to true, the view will scroll to the cell element.

items.name: startEditingAt(rowIndex, columnIndex, setScroll)
items.description: Set focus on the cell at the specified index of row and column and starts to edit.

params.name: setScroll
params.description: If set to true, the view will scroll to the cell element.

items.name: uncheck
items.description: Occurs when a checkbox in row header is unchecked

items.name: uncheck(rowKey)
items.description: Uncheck the row identified by the specified rowKey.

params.name: rowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: uncheckAll
items.description: Occurs when a checkbox in header is unchecked(unchecked all checkbox in row header)

items.name: uncheckAll(allPage)
items.description: Uncheck all rows.

params.name: allPage
params.description: Uncheck all rows when using pagination. The default value is 'true'.

items.name: uncheckBetween(startRowKey, endRowKey)
items.description: Uncheck the rows between the specified rowKeys. If endRowKey is not passed, perform 'uncheck' on the row of startRowKey.

params.name: startRowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

params.name: endRowKey
params.description: The unique key of the row

items.name: unfilter(columnName)
items.description: Remove filter state of specific column.

items.name: unsort(columnName)
items.description: If the parameter exists, unsort only column with columnName. If not exist, unsort all rows

params.name: columnName
params.description: The name of the column to be used to compare the rows

items.name: validate()
items.description:
Validate all data and returns the result.
Return value is an array which contains only rows which have invalid cell data.

examples.code: // return value example [ { rowKey: 1, errors: [ { columnName: 'c1', errorCode: ['REQUIRED'], errorInfo: [{ code: 'REQUIRED' }] }, { columnName: 'c2', errorCode: ['VALIDATOR_FN'], errorInfo: [{ code: 'VALIDATOR_FN', customCode: 'CUSTOM_CODE' }] } ] }, { rowKey: 3, errors: [ { columnName: 'c2', errorCode: ['MIN'], errorInfo: [{ code: 'MIN', min: 1000 }] } ] } ]
